title: Living Statue
description:
Animated statues of any size and material (three types described below; others may be invented by the referee).
Formed of crystals. Often human in form.
Stony crust filled with magma which they shoot from their fingertips.
extras: Immunity: Unaffected by sleep spells.	Magical origins: Created by powerful wizards.	Immunity: See main entry.	Attacks: Depend on form of statue (humanoid statues may use weapons, animal statues use claws, etc.).	Immunity: See main entry.	Absorb metals: Hits with non-magical, metal weapons cause damage, but the weapon may become stuck in the statue (save versus spells). Stuck weapons can be removed if the statue is killed.
